title: uLam ariyaadaa
sahitya:
uLam ariyAdA OyAdu en uLam pADum pADellAm O guhanAtha nin

anupallavi
 
kaLavariyAttoNDar aLavil karuNai koNDalAi akhilANDa carAcaram torum ninra
nin 

caraNam
 
paramAnanda krpAkara kanda prabhu nin nAma parAnanda vara kavi kunjaradAsa
ena tandak-karaNam tanil santatamum uraindaruL nin
